title: Jacey Nova: Starship Pilot
subtle: Science Fiction (fiction), 2,315 words, Level X (Grade 5), Lexile 920L
description: The year is 2035, and Jacey Nova, a human teenager, is offered the chance of a lifetime--an invitation to attend pilot training at Galaxon Headquarters on the Planet Martel. His natural ability helped him get there, but he has to learn to work with his Sarpedon co-pilot if he wants to be successful at this training school. The security of the Calabrian Galaxy depends upon the ability of these young pilots to work together to protect their intergalactic freedom.
meta: culminate, decoys, disengage, holograms, humanoids, indispensable, intricate, levitating, perpetually, simulation, sustained, tendrils
Use the reading strategy of summarizing
Punctuation : Identify colons in the text
Irregular Content Words : Understand and use content vocabulary
